requestParams.name: out_id
requestParams.desc: 外部订单号（不超过30个字符）

requestParams.name: shop_type
requestParams.desc: 网点类型（预留信息，外部可以不传）

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['shop_type']=""
params['qr_price']=1
params['qr_name']="test"
params['out_source']="pf_zhsm"
params['out_id']="pf_test111"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.trade.qrcode.ext.create', '3.0.0', 'GET', params=params, files=files)

'', 'qr_price' => '1', 'qr_name' => 'test', 'out_source' => 'pf_zhsm', 'out_id' => 'pf_test111', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(

);
